snippet: The Cutting Edge Group is growing more aggressive in the film score business, and it is planning for its new record label to increase its output quickly.
abstract: London's Cutting Edge Group, company that provides and invests in soundtracks, along with partner Wood Creek Capital Management, acquire well-known soundtrack label Varese Sarabande; acquisition is part of an aggressive expansion into film score business.
lead_paragraph: The Cutting Edge Group is growing more aggressive in the film score business, and it is planning for its new record label to increase its output quickly.

headline.seo: Cutting Edge Group Buys Varése Sarabande
headline.main: Investor in Movie Soundtracks Buys a Record Label
headline.print_headline: Investor in Movie Soundtracks Buys a Record Label
